snippet: Investigators said a senior economic policy maker, Liu Tienan, was “suspected of grave violations of discipline,” accusations first raised by a magazine editor.
abstract: China's top anticorruption agency says it is investigating Liu Tienan, senior economic policy maker, abrupt turn in case that openly pits Liu against campaigning investigative journalist Luo Changping.
lead_paragraph: Investigators said a senior economic policy maker, Liu Tienan, was “suspected of grave violations of discipline,” accusations first raised by a magazine editor.

headline.seo: China to Investigate Top Economic Policy Maker
headline.main: After a Journalist’s Prodding, China Investigates a Top Official
headline.print_headline: After a Journalist’s Prodding, China Investigates a Top Official

keywords.value: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (Communist Party of China)
keywords.name: organizations
